Fighters of the Indian Independence Movement to Get Back India Out of the British Hands.</p>%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009</div>%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00010%%00009</div><!-- data-src="https://aspiringyouths.com/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Grammarly-Banner-1024x240-1.png">%%00013%%00010</a></div><p>Indian Freedom Fighters finally drove the British out of the country and India became a free country on 15th August 1947.</p>%%00010<p>Hundreds of thousands of people lost their lives in order to make India independent. The <a href="https://aspiringyouths.com/modern-indian-history/">modern Indian history</a> contains a lot of incidents of bloodshed, hunger, and the war against the British.</p>%%00010<p>Here, in this blog post, there’s a list of some well-known Indian Freedom Fighters who opposed the British Raj in the Indian Sub-continent.</p>%%00010<p>Along with the names of the <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Indian_independence_activists" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Indian independence activists</a>, I have also provided their birth dates and the dates of their death.</p>%%00010<p>So, here we go…</p><div class="mailmunch-forms-in-post-middle" style="display: none !important;"></div>%%00010<figure id="attachment_1454"
